title: Dodge Charger logo Typeface
content:
Hi! I have a dear friend who just bought a Dodge Charger Daytona R/T, and you know how "muscle car" fans get with their vehicles, he wants to personalize it with a cutted vinyl phrase on the windshield, I'm a Typo Freak, so if I'm doing this, I'm gonna do it the right way, and that means with the right typeface...

Here's the logo:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150423013652im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DodgeCharger_3695.jpg)

I hope that this font even exist, or some similar font will do the job...
author: Quesito

comments.content:
Hi!

I guess no one else is going to Post, here's a sample of the final result... (just in case you guys want to know how it looks like)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150423013652im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Charger_5295.jpg)

Thanks! sii

Q™ says: It's all about the Fonts!!

Maybe I'm wrong, but the final result on that car's windshield looks different from the chrome lettering "badge" off the side of the car.

The windshield graphics look like they are set in Freeline Cruiser from T-26.
